output_list.reason: The batchTransfer function in the BattleToken contract allows an attacker to transfer a large number of tokens to any number of addresses in a single call, allowing an integer overflow.
The batchTransfer function in the BattleToken contract does not check the length of the _to array, allowing an attacker to set any number of addresses as the _to parameter.
The batchTransfer function in the BattleToken contract does not use the random function, allowing an attacker to set any number of addresses as the _to parameter.
The batchTransfer function in the BattleToken contract does not restrict access to the function, allowing attackers to set any number of addresses as the _to parameter.
The batchTransfer function in the BattleToken contract does not use the SafeMath library, allowing attackers to set any number of addresses as the _to parameter.
